name: shopping-list
description: A simple shopping list app. This directory contains the client, server, and shared projects.
author: Jack Hermanson <jack.hermanson@live.com>

scripts.install: (cd client && yarn install) && (cd server && yarn install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "kill-port 5000 && cd server && PORT=5000 yarn start"
